entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Uranium City
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
